ResearchProjectDef.label: felvine sowing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to sow felvine plants, and process it into a consumable drug. Ingesting felvine has absolutely no effect for most races, however cat-like Lynians receive quite an empowering high from it.

rulesStrings.li: observation->would get high on felvine before, and sometimes even during, battle.
observation->could sometimes be seen sniffing felvine flowers, seemingly as a form of recreation.
observation->would sit around a strange stone structure, that when activated would release dense clouds of felvine powder.
observation->would throw barrels filled with felvine powder to empower their allies during battle.
observation->seemed to have a strong obsession with felvine, and would trade almost anything for some.
observation->cultivated small gardens of felvine plants, and would could often be found asleep amongst the flowers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Lynian dye kit
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to craft the Lynian dye kit at the Lynian crafting spot.

rulesStrings.li: observation->would colour their fur with specially made dye.
observation->would mix felvine and tinctoria into a special mixture.
observation->would sit around their village dying each others fur.
observation->would dye their fur vibrant colours.
